get_services.Description: Get a list of the available HED services.
get_services.Returns: A list of the current HED services with descriptions.

events_validate.Name: events_validate
events_validate.Description: Validate a BIDS-style event file and JSON sidecar if provided.
events_validate.Returns: An error file as text if errors.

events_search.Name: events_search
events_search.Description: Search a BIDS-style event file and return list of event numbers satisfying search.
events_search.Returns: An error file as text if errors.

events_assemble.Name: events_assemble
events_assemble.Description: Assemble annotations for each event. Returns: text of assembled events or error list.
events_assemble.Returns: A string containing the text of assembled events file or a list of errors. The definitions are also returned if any.

events_generate_sidecar.Name: events_generate_sidecar
events_generate_sidecar.Description: Extract a template JSON sidecar based on the contents of the event file.
events_generate_sidecar.Returns: A JSON sidecar (template) in string form or a list of errors.

sidecar_validate.Description: Validate a BIDS JSON sidecar (in string form) and return errors.
sidecar_validate.Returns: A list of errors if any.

sidecar_to_long.Description: Convert a JSON sidecar with all of its HED tags expressed in long form.
sidecar_to_long.Returns: A converted JSON sidecar as text or a list of errors.

sidecar_to_short.Description: Convert a JSON sidecar with all of its HED tags expressed in short form.
sidecar_to_short.Returns: A converted JSON sidecar as text or a list of errors.

sidecar_extract_spreadsheet.Description: Convert the HED portion of a JSON sidecar to a 4-column spreadsheet.
sidecar_extract_spreadsheet.Returns: A string containing a 4-column tab-separated value spreadsheet extracted from the JSON.

sidecar_merge_spreadsheet.Description: Merge the information in a 4-column spreadsheet into the HED portion of a JSON sidecar.
sidecar_merge_spreadsheet.Returns: The JSON sidecar with the spreadsheet updates merged in.

spreadsheet_validate.Description: Validate a spreadsheet (tsv string) with HED tags in specified columns.
spreadsheet_validate.Returns: A list of errors if any.

spreadsheet_to_long.Description: Convert the indicated columns of a spreadsheet to long.
spreadsheet_to_long.Returns: The spreadsheet converted to short form or a list of errors if any.

spreadsheet_to_short.Description: Convert the indicated columns of a spreadsheet to short.
spreadsheet_to_short.Returns: The spreadsheet converted to short form or a list of errors if any.

strings_validate.Description: Validate a list of HED strings and return errors.
strings_validate.Returns: A list of errors if any.

strings_to_long.Description: Convert a list of strings to long form if valid, otherwise return errors.
strings_to_long.Returns: The string converted to short form or a list of errors if any.

strings_to_short.Description: Convert a list of strings to short form.
strings_to_short.Returns: The string converted to short form or a list of errors if any.

parameter_meanings.check_for_warnings: If true, check for warnings when processing HED strings.
parameter_meanings.column_x_check: If present with value 'on' column x has HED tags. (x is column position starting at 0.)
parameter_meanings.column_x_input: The prefix prepended to column number x (starting at 0) if column x has HED tags.
parameter_meanings.columns_categorical: A list of names of categorical event file columns
parameter_meanings.columns_included: A list of names of columns to be included for assembly or query.
parameter_meanings.columns_value: A list of names of value event file columns
parameter_meanings.events_string: A BIDS events file as a string.
parameter_meanings.expand_defs: If true replaces Def/XXX with Def-expand/XXX grouped with the definition content.
parameter_meanings.has_column_names: If true, interpret the first row of file as column names.
parameter_meanings.hed_strings: List of HED strings to be processed.
parameter_meanings.include_description_tag: Include the Description/XXX tag in the tag string
parameter_meanings.json_list: A list of BIDS JSON sidecars as strings.
parameter_meanings.json_string: A JSON sidecar as a string.
parameter_meanings.query_list: A list of query strings for searching.
parameter_meanings.schema_string: HED XML schema as a string.
parameter_meanings.schema_url: A URL from which a HED schema can be downloaded.
parameter_meanings.schema_version: Version of HED to used in processing.
parameter_meanings.spreadsheet_string: A spreadsheet tsv as a string.

returns.error_type: Type of error if the service failed.
returns.error_msg: Explanation of the message if the service failed.

results.command: Command executed in response to the service request.
results.command_target: Type of data on which the command was executed.
results.definitions: A dictionary of definitions used in processing.
results.data: Data returned by the service (either processed result or a list of errors).
results.msg_category: Success or warning depending on the result of processing the service.
results.msg: Explanation of the output of the service.
results.output_display_name: (Optional) File name for saving return data.
results.schema_version: (Optional) Version of the HED schema used in the processing.
results.software_version: A dictionary of the version and date of hedtools and hed services.
